channel.title: Need a Server host online 24/7?
channel.description:
I will be accepting people to use my "Server Comp" There will be 4 hard drive's nammed of the 4 servers that i will host. Note: I will need to figure out how to let you guys view your own hard drives to change what you need.
<Not sure how to run 4 but i will figure out>
List of people that want to use------Number of players 1.(Not sure tho) SoulScape ----- 30+
Comp Specs Cpu: Intel Core 2 Duo E6700 Conroe 2.66GHz LGA 775 Processor FSB: 1066MHz Hyper-Threading Support: No L1 Cache: 32KB+32KB L2 Cache: 4M sharing Multi-Core: Dual-Core Series: Core 2 Duo
MotherBoard: ASUS P5W64 WS Professional Socket T (LGA 775) Intel 975X ATX Server Motherboard
Ram: OCZ 2GB (2 x 1GB) 240-Pin DDR2 SDRAM DDR2 800 (PC2 6400) Dual Channel Kit Desktop Memory (ATI CrossFire Certified) I got 4 sticks = 4 gb ram.
Ethernet: 1000mbps (Connected to Cable internet.) it was on the motherboard.
^all basic stuff if you want full info. Go to newegg.com its were i bought it all.
Pm me for updates and server info. Currently waiting on parts and help from server people to get it set up so you can access it and change server stuff.
